BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PIST_SAN_POST_FILLED_DTL (STR_EMP_NUMBER,NUM_SANC_NUMBER,NUM_HOSPITAL_ID,NUM_GRANT_TYPE_ID,NUM_CADRE_ID,STR_POST_SANC_FOR,NUM_DEPT_CODE,NUM_NATJOB_ID,NUM_PAY_ATTRI_CODE,NUM_PAY_ID,NUM_DESIG_ID,NUM_NO_POST_SANC,STR_CATEGORY_NAME,STR_ROSTER_PT_USED, NUM_SENIORITY_NO, DT_SENIORITY_DATE, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE PIST_SAN_POST_FILLED_DTL A SET A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=?,A.NUM_SANC_NUMBER=?,A.NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?,A.NUM_GRANT_TYPE_ID=?,A.NUM_CADRE_ID=?,A.STR_POST_SANC_FOR=?,A.NUM_DEPT_CODE=?,A.NUM_NATJOB_ID=?,A.NUM_PAY_ATTRI_CODE=?,A.NUM_PAY_ID=?,A.NUM_DESIG_ID=?,A.NUM_NO_POST_SANC=?,A.STR_CATEGORY_NAME=?,A.STR_ROSTER_PT_USED=?,A.NUM_SENIORITY_NO=?,A.DT_SENIORITY_DATE=?, A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=?, A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_SAN_POST_FILLED_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NUMBER=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
